descriptions:
Introducing the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair! This chair is perfect for gamers and office workers alike, providing the utmost comfort and support during long hours of sitting.

The chair comes in a sleek purple color, adding a touch of style to your gaming or office setup. It is made with premium soft PU leather, ensuring durability and a luxurious feel. The hand-sewing diamond cross stitching adds a sophisticated touch to the overall design.

Featuring a USB-powered lumbar pillow with massage function, this chair provides ultimate relaxation and comfort. You can easily adjust the chair's reclining angle from 90° to 155°, allowing you to find the perfect position for gaming or working. The 360° swivel feature enables easy movement and accessibility.

The chair is height adjustable, ensuring that you can find the most suitable position for your desk or gaming setup. With a rocking feature of 15°, you can lean back and relax during breaks. The adjustable armrests, both vertically and horizontally, provide excellent support and can be customized to your liking. The armrests are coated with soft PU leather, adding a touch of comfort.

The chair's frame is integrated with metal, ensuring sturdiness and durability. The 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover wheelbase has been tested for 2000 miles, guaranteeing smooth and safe movement. The thickened explosion-proof chassis adds an extra layer of safety.

The tilt mechanism allows you to adjust the chair's angle from 90° to 155°, and the safety lock ensures stability and security. The gas cylinder is SGS and BIFMA certified, ensuring durability and safety. The chair has a weight capacity of 330 lbs, accommodating individuals of various sizes.

Rest assured with our excellent warranty. We offer a one-month free return policy and a 5-year parts replacement guarantee. If you encounter any issues, our customer service is available 24/7 to assist you.

The seat cushion is made with high-density shaped foam, providing exceptional comfort and support. With a thickness of 4.3 inches, it ensures a plush seating experience. The cushion is also resilient and breathable, allowing for prolonged use without discomfort.

The chair is designed with ergonomic support in mind. The retractable footrest provides added comfort during breaks, and the adjustable and detachable headrest and lumbar support allow you to find the perfect position for your body.

Suitable for both gaming enthusiasts and office workers, this chair is versatile and adaptable to various environments. It is easy to assemble, with pre-assembled screws and clear instructions included.

Upgrade your gaming or office experience with the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair. We prioritize customer experience and are committed to providing the best support possible. Buy now and indulge in ultimate comfort and style!

Introducing the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair! This chair is perfect for gamers and office workers alike, providing comfort, style, and functionality all in one package.

The chair features a sleek purple color that will add a vibrant touch to any space. The premium soft PU leather material ensures durability and a luxurious feel. The hand-sewing diamond cross stitching adds a touch of elegance and attention to detail.

For added comfort, the chair comes with a lumbar pillow that is USB powered and equipped with a massage function. Say goodbye to backaches and enjoy a soothing massage while you work or play. The chair also reclines from 90° to 155°, allowing you to find the perfect position for relaxation or intense gaming sessions.

The chair swivels a full 360°, giving you complete freedom of movement. It is also height adjustable, ensuring that you can find the perfect position for your desk or gaming setup. The rocking feature allows for gentle movement and added comfort during long hours of sitting.

The armrests are adjustable both vertically and horizontally, providing customizable support for your arms and wrists. They are also made of soft PU leather for added comfort.

The chair's frame is made of integrated metal, ensuring stability and durability. The 5-point heavy duty anti-rollover wheelbase has undergone rigorous rolling tests of 2000 miles, guaranteeing smooth and safe movement.

Safety is a top priority with the thickened explosion-proof chassis and adjustable tilt mechanism. The tilt mechanism allows you to adjust the chair angle from 90° to 155°, and the safety lock ensures stability and prevents accidental tipping.

The chair's gas cylinder is SGS and BIFMA certified, ensuring long-lasting durability and safety. It has a weight capacity of 330lbs, making it suitable for users of all sizes.

We also offer a comprehensive warranty for your peace of mind. The chair comes with a one-month free return policy and 5 years of free parts replacement.

The seat cushion is made of high density shaped foam with a thickness of 4.3 inches. It provides great resilience and breathability, ensuring comfort even during long hours of use.

The chair's ergonomic design includes a retractable footrest, adjustable and detachable headrest, and adjustable lumbar support. These features allow you to customize the chair to your specific needs, providing maximum comfort and support for your body.

Whether you're a dedicated gamer or need a comfortable chair for your office, the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair is the perfect choice. It is easy to assemble with pre-assembled screws and comes with 24/7 customer support for any assistance you may need.

Upgrade your seating experience and take your gaming or work setup to the next level with this stylish and functional chair. Don't miss out on the ultimate comfort and support that the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair has to offer.

The integrated metal frame ensures durability and stability, while the 5-point heavy duty anti-rollover wheelbase has been tested for 2000 miles to ensure smooth and safe movement. 

Safety is a top priority with the chair's thickened explosion-proof chassis and adjustable tilt mechanism with a safety lock. 

The chair is certified by SGS and BIFMA for its gas cylinder, which guarantees its durability. It has a weight capacity of 330lb, making it suitable for users of different sizes. 

With a one-month free return policy and 5 years of parts replacement, the chair is backed by a comprehensive warranty. 

The seat cushion is made of high density shaped foam, providing great resilience and breathability. It is 4.3 inches thick for maximum comfort during long hours of sitting. 

The chair offers excellent ergonomic support with a retractable footrest, adjustable and detachable headrest, and adjustable lumbar support. 

Whether you are a gamer or an office worker, this chair is suitable for all your needs. 

Assembly is easy with pre-assembled screws and instructions included. 

We pride ourselves on providing excellent customer service, with 24/7 support to assist you with any questions or concerns. 

Upgrade your sitting experience with the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair. Get yours now and enjoy the ultimate comfort and support!

The reclining feature allows you to adjust the chair's angle from 90° to 155°, giving you the freedom to find your perfect position. The chair also swivels a full 360°, allowing for easy movement and access to your surroundings. The armrests of this chair are truly customizable. They can be adjusted both vertically and horizontally, providing you with the perfect arm support. The armrests are made of soft PU leather for added comfort.

Safety is a top priority with this chair. The 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover wheelbase has been tested for durability, with rolling tests of up to 2000 miles. The tilt mechanism allows you to adjust the chair angle from 90° to 155° and features a safety lock.

This chair is suitable for both gaming and office use, making it versatile for any environment. It is easy to assemble, with pre-assembled screws and clear instructions included. The chair also comes with a one-month free return policy and a 5-year warranty for parts replacement.
